definition: Objects designed for leisure activities, entertainment, or social enjoyment

positive_examples: The pool table in the basement gets lots of use during family gatherings
She installed a wet bar in her den for hosting cocktail parties
The batting gloves helped him get a better grip during practice
They set up a dartboard in the garage for weekend tournaments
The home theater system made movie nights much more enjoyable
His collection of board games filled an entire closet
negative_examples: The kitchen knife was sharp enough to cut through the vegetables
She used a wrench to tighten the loose pipe
The office desk had plenty of storage space for files
The medical equipment was sterilized before surgery
The farmer's plow broke down in the middle of the field
The construction hammer was heavy but well-balanced
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: WorkTools, MedicalDevices, KitchenUtensils, TransportVehicles
